entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • There is no ClickableSpan entry to the AttributedText #17308
  • Support PresentationTraceSources.TraceLevel and PresentationTraceSources.SetTraceLevel() #17304
  • [performance] all `PropertyMapper`'s set the same values over and over #17303
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Exception occurs when modifying an ObservableCollection that has a binding to a BindableLayout on a thread from the ThreadPool #17302
  • Line is not visible in .Net 8 #17298
  • Path position is not proper in .Net 7 #17297

Closed

  • DatePicker: Clear #17299
  • SearchBar: Inconsistent behavior (Keyboard and Properties) in iOS and Android #9092
    Backlog
  • . #17249
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8384] Grid ColV isn't constrained to row #15121
    .NET 8 GA
  • Screen is partially scrolled and hidden when showing the virtual keyboard #15838
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration

Merged

  • [Android] Fix single taps #16561
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17284
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of ActivityExtensions.GetWindowFrame #17256
    .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Update main with latest changes for internal builds #17255
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    s/pr-needs-author-input, area/platform, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #17093
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16692
    area/controls 🎮, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    area/architecture, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] x:Type and x:Static don't expand to Extension #15903
    area/Xaml </>, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, stale, area/theme, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, stale, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-menubar, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
    stale, Under Consideration
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, stale, control-dialog, Under Consideration
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • First draft of pulling apart text wrapping, max lines, and text overflow #10279
    area/controls 🎮, control-label, stale, Under Consideration
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨, stale, area/theme, Under Consideration
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
    area/collectionview 📃, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [Housekeeping] Review all the pending TODOs comments related with .NET 8 #16670
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable requesting the full preview size on iOS drag shadow #17282
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes BindableLayout leaks on BindingContext #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • [X] do not register srcinfo for xaml-defined values #17230
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA
